channel.title: Help making a command 317
channel.description: I wanted to add a command that would skull your character, like give them a skull as if they attacked someone, for my 317. Can anybody help? or give me the code?

item.title: Help making a command 317
item.dc:creator: @melt_man1 melt man1
item.description:
@melt_man1 wrote:

This is probably gonna sound stupid, but where can i find the variables and what are they? >_> im really new at this…

Edit: Can anybody exlain the who variables thing to me? >_<

Read full topic

item.title: Help making a command 317
item.dc:creator: @melt_man1 melt man1
item.description:
@melt_man1 wrote:

[code]client.java:29858: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable skulls
location: class client
if(skulls !=1 && !isSkulled) {
^
client.java:29858: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable isSkulled
location: class client
if(skulls !=1 && !isSkulled) {
^
client.java:29859: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable skull
location: class client
skull = 1;
^
client.java:29860: cannot find symbol
symbol : variable isSkulled
location: class client
isSkulled = true;
^
client.java:29861: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendMessege(java.lang.String)
location: class client
sendMessege(“You have been skulled.”);
^
client.java:29863: cannot find symbol
symbol : method sendMessege(java.lang.String)
location: class client
sendMessege(“You are all ready skulled!”);

                            ^

6 errors
Press any key to continue . . .[/code]

Now im getting all this D:

Read full topic

item.title: Help making a command 317
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“skull”)) {
if(!isSkulled) {
isSkulled = true;
sM(“You have been skulled.”);
} else {
sM(“You are all ready skulled!”);
}
}

Read full topic

item.title: Help making a command 317
item.dc:creator: @melt_man1 melt man1
item.description:
@melt_man1 wrote:

client.java:29856: cannot find symbol symbol : variable command location: class client if(command.equalsIgnoreCase("skull")) ^ client.java:29858: cannot find symbol symbol : variable skulls location: class client if(skulls !=1) { ^ client.java:29859: cannot find symbol symbol : variable skulls location: class client skulls = 1; ^ client.java:29860: cannot find symbol symbol : method sM(java.lang.String) location: class client sM("You have been skulled."); ^ client.java:29862: cannot find symbol symbol : method sM(java.lang.String) location: class client sM("You are all ready skulled!"); ^ 5 errors Press any key to continue . . .

Thats why my compiler is telling me
